reference.title: Mass Update Job and Salary Work Event
reference.shortdesc: The Mass Update Job and Salary work event guides you through the process of mass updating job and salary information for multiple employees.

section.p: After you select the type of mass update to complete, the applicable pages appear in the work event:
The Change Job and Salary work event supports mass updates to the current job history record only. Refer to the table to determine which record types, values, rules, and workflow are supported.

ul.li: Current Job RecordField Values: Job Group, Job, Pay Group, Pay Frequency, Scheduled Hours, Employee Type, Hourly/Salaried, Full/Part Time, Shift Group, Shift, Org Levels (1 - 4), Labor Union, and National Union
Current Job RecordField Values: Alternate Title, Supervisor, Hire Source, Project, Time Clock, Seasonal, Agricultural, Youth/Training, Direct Labor, Pay Automatically, Promotion, Transfer, Notes.
Current Salary RecordField Values: Pay Group, Pay Frequency, Scheduled Hours, Percent Change, New Rate, Pay Scale, Salary Step
Current Salary RecordField Values: Pay Currency, Other Rates
Review Information: Review Date, Rating, Type, Reviewer, Notes
Position Management Record for Change Position
Position Management Record for Change Position and Salary
Position Management Record for Change Salary

row.entry: United States and Canada Employees and Companies
Role Based Filtering: Org Levels (1-4), New Job, Pay Groups
Company Code Filtering: Org Levels (1-4), Job Group, New Job, Pay Groups
